title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Voted Best Manufactured Stone and Brick Veneer Brand Among Builders and Contractors for Sixth Straight Year

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – For the sixth straight year, Eldorado Stone has been voted the number one brand for manufactured stone and brick veneer by builders from across the United States. BUILDER Magazine’s annual Brand Use Study, conducted by Zonda’s BPM Advisory Team, provides a critical snapshot of trade professionals’ familiarity with and usage of building products in a variety of categories. The 2021 study marks the second consecutive year that Eldorado Stone has swept the ‘Manufactured Stone’ category.

“Our team’s top priority is crafting beautiful products that elevate both the aesthetics and function of any space while also enhancing the design and construction experience,” said Sarah Lograsso, Director of Marketing and Product Design for Eldorado Stone. “We are honored to receive this acknowledgement because it indicates our manufacturing and design decisions continue to resonate with trade professionals looking to ensure the best results for their projects.”

TWEET THIS: For the sixth straight year, the @BuilderOnline Brand Use Study ranks @EldoradoStone as the No. 1 brand for manufactured stone and brick veneer. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2021BuilderStudy

Eldorado Stone was the top pick in all four ‘Manufactured Stone’ subcategories in 2021, including Brand Familiarity, Brands Used in the Past Two Years, Brands Used the Most and Highest Overall Quality Rating. The brand also ranked first in Highest Overall Quality Rating in the ‘Siding: Brick and Brick Veneer’ category. Survey participants cited product performance, product availability through a preferred dealer, price, and ease of installation as the primary attributes that influenced their selections for manufactured stone and brick veneer products.

To learn more about Eldorado Stone and its products, visit EldoradoStone.com. For more information on the 2021 BUILDER Brand Use Study and to download a copy, click here.

Related Links:

  • Eldorado Stone website
  • 2021 BUILDER Brand Use Study

–

About Eldorado Stone
Eldorado Stone, LLC is the manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer and is headquartered in San Marcos, California. For over 50 years, Eldorado Stone has demonstrated an undeniable passion for creating authentic products that elevate quality and design, including architectural stone and brick veneer profiles for indoor and outdoor applications in a wide variety of residential and commercial spaces. The company currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S. For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com.
